name: Mystery in Macet
description:
Mystery in Macet is an RPG following a pair of college students that, believing in and looking for the supernatural, stumble into a side of the world very different than what they expected.

Made in RPG Maker MV (with some assets from other RPG Maker versions), this is a work in progress game I've been working on for a while.  It is an urban fantasy, particularly inspired by Persona.  

My plan at the moment is to alternate between small and larger updates in the future.
